document.full_text: tunisian authorities have arrested nearly 200 people after a series of anti-government protests that culminated in a street battle at the weekend in the capital, the state tap new agency reported on tuesday.
document.title: tunisia arrests nearly 200 after protests
lines_and_colors: tunisian authorities have arrested nearly 200 people after a series of anti-government protests that culminated in a street battle at the weekend in the capital, the state tap new agency reported on tuesday.
